body.description: Get a phone that’s as affordable as it is awesome with Samsung Galaxy A03s by Tracfone. With a large 6.5-inch Infinity-V display, this smartphone provides a vibrant and immersive visual experience, perfect for streaming videos and browsing your favorite content. Equipped with a powerful quad-core processor and 32GB of internal storage (expandable with a microSD card), the Galaxy A03s ensures smooth multitasking and ample space for photos, videos, apps and more. Capture stunning photos with the triple-lens 13MP main camera and take selfies that pop with the 5MP front-facing camera. Pair this device with a premium wireless experience without the premium price tag or costly long-term contracts – get Unlimited talk & text plans from Total by Verizon that start at just $30/mo for a single line. Enjoy special perks like hotspot capability, international long distance calling, and exclusive discounts. Shop for the Samsung Galaxy A03s and your next Total by Verizon plan online today.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A03 WORTH THE PRICES
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with any Samsung Galaxy let alone the A03. It works perfectly has a side phone and does what it needs to. Just don't expect a super fast phone cause this ain't it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SIM card does not work
reviews.reviewText: Bought this phone 2 days ago and I am still unable to call out on it. I have been to Verizon, and both of the stores I went to have never even heard of this plan. The SIM cards at Verizon do not work for this phone. I called customer service numerous times to get help just to finally be told that the SIM card is not compatible and I need to buy a new one. I was also hung up on after complaining about needing to buy a new one. No one has these SIM cards so I basically just can’t get the phone to work after I already paid for service. Horrible experience and not to mention completely RUINED my daughters birthday gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the Best & Smartest Phone Purchases!!
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a brand new Cellphone, and after many year's of multiple LG Zone Cellphone's through Verizon and not knowing just how much longer Verizon was going to be supporting the LG's and searching around for a affordable Samsung Galaxy Smartphone and then coming across Total by Verizon with a very affordable Samsung Galaxy Smartphone, I couldn't pass this up and it certainly has become one of my favorite Smartphones. What's the difference between the Apple I Phone's and the Samsung Galaxy Smartphone's not much only the actual price of either of a Contracted or Pay as You go Prepaid plan, and both coming out with new model's every year!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Affordable but Slow
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Samsung A03, lured by its attractive price tag. As they say, "You get what you pay for," and this phone perfectly embodies that sentiment. If you're looking for a budget-friendly device that covers the basics, the A03 might be an option to consider. However, be prepared to deal with its frustratingly sluggish performance.Pros:✅ Budget-Friendly: One of the most appealing aspects of the Samsung A03 is undoubtedly its price. It's a wallet-friendly option for those who need a smartphone but don't want to break the bank.✅ Decent Display: The display is adequate for everyday tasks such as checking emails, browsing social media, and watching videos. The colors are decent, and the screen size is comfortable.Cons:❌ Sluggish Performance: The most significant drawback of the A03 is its painfully slow performance. Apps take forever to open, switching between tasks is a test of patience, and even simple actions like typing can lead to frustrating delays. This sluggishness significantly hampers the overall user experience.❌ Limited Storage: The internal storage on the A03 is quite limited, leaving you with minimal space for apps, photos, and other files. You'll likely find yourself constantly juggling storage to make room for new content.❌ Mediocre Camera: While I didn't expect flagship-level camera quality from a budget phone, the A03's camera still falls short. Photos lack detail and tend to look washed out, especially in low-light conditions.❌ Outdated Software: The A03 comes with an older version of Samsung's software, and updates are infrequent. This not only means missing out on the latest features but also leaves you vulnerable to security risks.Overall Impression:The Samsung A03 is a prime example of the trade-off between price and performance. If you're on a tight budget and need a device for the bare minimum tasks like calls, texts, and occasional browsing, the A03 might serve its purpose. However, if you're looking for a smoother experience, even for basic tasks, I'd recommend saving up a bit more for a more capable phone. The sluggishness and limited features of the A03 can quickly become frustrating, overshadowing its affordable price point. Consider your priorities carefully before making a decision.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comprueben si es lo que ocupan
reviews.reviewText: Es muy buen celular, No hay ni una queja es Samsung y por el Precio que lo adquirí es muy bueno, Solo hay que saber antes de comprar que El celular esta Bloqueado y no se puede usar en Redes Móviles así que tengan en cuenta eso yo lo compre para mi Niña y solo lo usa en Casa.

Es un buen celular en México esta bloqueado para usar con un chip perp se puede usar bien como una tableta pequeña, o paratener app en un segundo telefono y dejarlo en casa o oara jugar funciona bien.
El equipo viene incompleto, no trae la caja del convertidor de voltaje y viene bloqueado no se puede usar en México solo en USA.
no he podido desbloquearlo,pero por el precio esta bien
